resources.string: This application require to enable its accessibility service in order to work.\nYou can use the following button to enable or disable the service conveniently.
You can create a shortcut icon on your launcher to preform the lock action.
Please enable its accessibility service first

This accessibility service is used to provide the lock screen ability in the Pineapple Lock Screen application, otherwise the application won't be able to work.

To enable the accessibility service, just tap the toggle switch in the top right corner, then tap Allow on the next screen. You don't need to enable the second shortcut switch.

Note:
1. If you force stop the main application, you might need to enable this service again.
2. If the service is enabled but the application doesn't work as intended, try disable and enable it again.

This application uses the Accessibility Service to provide the lock screen functionality. Related service needs to be enabled to work.

You can use the entrance link in the main screen to access the accessibility setting at any time you want.

This application doesn't collect any user data. You can also review the full content of Privacy Policy in the About screen.
In some launchers, if you drag a shortcut from the widget list to the home screen, you can create a shortcut icon without the application icon displayed in the corner when using the compat method.
Consider disable it for this application

Some phone models/ROM may have very restrictive battery optimization functions which will result application service get killed in the background. Every time this application get killed, you'll need to enable its accessibility service again.

 To prevent this, you can disable Battery optimization for this application via system Settings screen by:
 
 1. Select All apps in the dropdown
 2. Select Pineapple Lock Screen then switch off or choose Don't optimize
 
This setting is only needed when your ROM keep killing the service of this application, you don't need to do anything if it works fine. Providing the ability of locking screen is the only thing that the service of this application will do. This won't affact your battery life.
